editor.title: Structured Playlists Editor
editor.description: Define structured playlists to organize automatic your playlists.

available-playlists.title: Available Playlists
available-playlists.description: Drag and drop playlists to add them to dependency tree.

dependency-tree.title: Dependency Tree
dependency-tree.empty-description: Drag and drop playlists to add them to dependency tree.
dependency-tree.drop-here: Drop here to add a root playlist
dependency-tree.drop-here-child: Drop here to add a child playlist
dependency-tree.remove-node: Remove node (children will be moved to parent)
